scripts.docker:build: docker build -t zwf -f ./devops/Dockerfile --no-cache --build-arg NODE_ENV=prod --build-arg REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region ap-southeast-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 611861040793.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com && docker tag zwf:latest 611861040793.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/zwf:latest && docker push 611861040793.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/zwf:latest
scripts.release:notes: echo $"export const notes=\`"> zwf-web/src/release_changes.js && git log $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 @^)..@ --pretty=format:"%s" >> zwf-web/src/release_changes.js && echo "\`" >> zwf-web/src/release_changes.js
scripts.release: pnpm release:notes && git commit -am 'update release notes' && pnpm release:tag && pnpm docker:build && pnpm docker:push && pnpm ecs:update && pnpm flush
